abstract: Jacob J. Lew’s arrangement with his former employer, Citigroup, is not so unusual on Wall Street, a study finds. | Cyprus is scrambling to find ways to finance its bailout. | C.D.O.’S, an investment class at the heart of the credit crisis, appear to be making a comeback. | Some start-ups are caught in purgatory.
